title: Creamy bean and red pepper burritos
ingredients: ['1 flour tortilla', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 small red onion, chopped', '1/4 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 (400g) tin pinto beans, rinsed and drained', 'a few jalapeno slices, minced', '2 to 3 tablespoons cream cheese', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander']
